snippet: With the introduction of a sweeping immigration bill in Washington this week, immigrants across the country are paying close attention to how it might change their lives.
abstract: Immigrants nationwide are paying close attention to how sweeping new immigration bill might change their lives; express guarded optimism at prospect of proposal becoming law, enabling people who have lived in country for decades without authorization to travel and work legally.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Lizette Alvarez, Vanessa Garcia and Anthony Cave from Miami; Fernanda Santos from Phoenix; and Kim Severson and Robbie Brown from Atlanta.

lead_paragraph: With the introduction of a sweeping immigration bill in Washington this week, immigrants across the country are paying close attention to how it might change their lives.

headline.seo: Immigrants Weigh Possible Impact of New Legislation
headline.main: With a Bill Now in the Senate, Immigrants Weigh the Possible Impact
headline.print_headline: Immigrants Weigh Possible Impacts of Senate Bill
